name: Vesuvian Cats
description:
Vesuvian Cats is a project for a summer course in game development. We completed it in three days. 

We'd like to add more to this one, but for now, we hope you appreciate Uranus Cat, as well as the other characters... :^)

Interested in the extra credit project that was being developed side-by-side Vesuvian Cats? Visit Kourtnie's interactive book review: 

How Games Move Us: A Review
